name: IP FEDERATION
membership: The IP Federation is a member of the CONFEFERATION OF BRITISH INDUSTRY.
goal: representation of the views of UK industry on intellectual property issues.
interests: Competition, Culture, Customs, Enterprise, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives:
• Unified Patent Court (UPC)
• Unitary Patent (UP)
• Trade secrets directive
